company.name: AIR TRAFFIC TECHNICAL COMPANY LIMITED
company.nameSecondary: CÔNG TY TNHH KỸ THUẬT QUẢN LÝ BAY

1986.title: Establishment of Aviation Electronics Enterprise
1986.description: Aviation Electronics Enterprise was established with the goal of building a unit to provide general electronic technical services for the entire Vietnam civil aviation industry.

1989.title: Establishment of Aviation Information Center
1989.description: On January 29, 1989, the Aviation Information Center was established based on the merger of Aviation Electronics Enterprise and C29 Information Exploitation Team, under the Air Traffic Management Company.

1998.title: Renamed to Air Traffic Management Technical Service Center
1998.description: On June 5, 1998, Aviation Information Center was renamed to Air Traffic Management Technical Service Center, operating under the Vietnam Civil Aviation Management Center.

2008.title: Transformation and establishment of Flight Operation Support Technical Service Center
2008.description: In 2008, Vietnam Civil Aviation Management Center became Flight Operation Support Corporation. On March 23, 2009, Flight Operation Support Technical Service Center was established based on reorganizing the Air Traffic Management Technical Service Center.

2010.title: Establishment of Air Traffic Technical Company Limited
2010.description: On July 22, 2010, Air Traffic Technical Company Limited was established based on reorganizing the Flight Operation Support Technical Service Center, with Vietnam Air Traffic Management Corporation owning 100% of charter capital.

iso.introTitle: Introduction to ISO 9001:2015 Quality Management System
iso.introDescription: Air Traffic Technical Company Limited establishes and implements a quality management system to affirm its ability to consistently provide products that meet customer requirements and applicable legal requirements. The company continuously satisfies customers through effective application of the quality management system, prevention of nonconformity and continuous improvement.
iso.commitmentParagraph1: Air Traffic Technical Company Limited is committed to establishing, documenting, implementing and maintaining the quality management system while continuously improving the effectiveness and efficiency of the system according to the requirements of ISO 9001:2015 standard.
iso.commitmentParagraph2: The quality policy was announced by Company Management on January 1, 2018.
iso.commitmentParagraph3: Modern, quality, safety, convenience and efficiency as attributes of aviation products and services. Our vision is to become a multi-owned corporation operating in the fields of: Providing aviation information, navigation and surveillance services; Providing flight inspection and calibration services; Aviation industrial manufacturing.
iso.commitmentParagraph4: To ensure that 'Our products and services are safe, quality and convenient according to aviation standards'.

timeline.2005: The company was evaluated by BVQI of the UK and issued a certificate meeting the international standard ISO 9001:2000.
timeline.2008: On January 29, 2008, the company's quality management system was evaluated by TUV NORD of Germany for re-certification and issued the second ISO 9001:2000 Quality Management System Certificate.
timeline.2011: On January 15, 2011, the company completed the transition from TCVN ISO 9001:2000 to TCVN ISO 9001:2008 standard and was issued ISO 9001:2008 certificate by BSi of the United Kingdom.
timeline.2017: The company's quality management system is maintained, periodically monitored once a year and re-certified every 3 years. Latest certificate issuance: January 15, 2017.
timeline.2018: The company transitioned from ISO 9001:2008 to ISO 9001:2015, effective from January 1, 2018.
